mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (employee_idx, department_idx, team_idx, duty_idx, position_idx, login_id, login_pw, name, en_name, profile_image, gender, birthday, phone_number, email, address, ins_date, upd_date) VALUES ( employee_seq.nextval, #{departmentIdx}, #{teamIdx}, #{dutyIdx}, #{positionIdx}, #{loginId}, #{loginPw}, #{name}, #{enName}, #{profileImage}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{address}, sysdate, sysdate )
